name: Park Footy
description:
Game Description

Lets go down to the park and catch the footy, if you can. Inspired by games such as Hand Simulator and QWOP, this game gives you the simple task of trying to catch a footy as many times as you can before the sun sets and it's time to go home.

Controls - Xbox Controller

Left Stick - Left Arm

Right Stick - Right Arm

Right Trigger - Clench Hands

Left/Right D-Pad - Movement Left/Right

Credits

Made in Unity, Artwork done in MagicaVoxel
